1.title: And the job of a life time...
1.plot: India's Prime Minister Priyamvada Thakur is losing popularity with the voters. Her secretary Ashok Pandey suggests a wild strategy to help gain some political advantage. Guess who comes to the rescue? Fashionista and NRI Tanya Bansal. From the population of over a billion people, what makes Tanya a perfect candidate?

2.title: And the best selfie ever...
2.plot: By-elections are announced, and Tanya Thakur is set to contest the elections from Sumerpur. Her campaigning begins on a disastrous note, and she decides to leave the country, but not before organizing a one of a kind fashion show. Her grandma Priyamvada Thakur couldn't be more horrified.

3.title: And love thy neighbour...
3.plot: India's youngest PM Tanya Thakur takes the oath in her own style. As soon as she takes office, a slew of issues awaits the PM's immediate attention. Peace talks with neighbouring countries, South Asian Summit, terrorism and, of course, the wrath of the opposition are just few issues of national importance. But before that, PM Tanya has a crazy and controversial request.

4.title: And force thy neighbour to love you...
4.plot: The leaders of South Asian countries reach India. PM Tanya Thakur plays a fine host. But the huge task before her is to get the leaders to sign a crucial peace treaty. What will Tanya do to bring some peace in the region? Meanwhile, former PM Priyamvada Thakur is getting increasingly worried over Tanya's antics.

5.title: And it's time to create history...
5.plot: What does it take to change a law in the largest democracy of the world? Next issue on PM Tanya's agenda is a law that needs to be changed. But before she can introduce the bill in the parliament, she must take care of some internal opposition. Enter Swamiji, grandma's trusted and revered aid. What will Priyamvada Thakur do to stop Tanya?

6.title: And the coming out party...
6.plot: PM Tanya Thakur is not the one to back down. She does what she is best at - being all over social media. But whether she trends for the right reasons or not, that's for India to decide. However, Indian politicians and fellow MPs don't show any signs of warming up to her ways. Are Tanya's trendy and fashionable ideas putting the future of Indian democracy in jeopardy?

7.title: And the high hook-up...
7.plot: Throughout her short but eventful political stint, PM Tanya also gains few enemies along with millions of followers. While Tanya makes exciting date plans with Sachin, grandma Priyamvada Thakur hatches a sinister plan to secure her Prime Ministerial candidature for the next elections. Stakes are high in this battle between the grandma and the granddaughter.

imdb.plot outline: Can you wear Milan's hottest fashion to Sansad Bhavan? Probably not, unless you are Tanya Bansal Thakur - a young and bubbly fashion blogger from London who is about to become the youngest Prime Minister of India. Will she live up to the expectations of 1.3 billion people?
imdb.title: PM Selfiewallie
plot: Can you wear Milan's hottest fashion to Sansad Bhavan? Probably not, unless you are Tanya Bansal Thakur - a young and bubbly fashion blogger from London who is about to become the youngest Prime Minister of India. Will she live up to the expectations of 1.3 billion people?

Life was #awesome for Tanya, a popular NRI fashion blogger, born and raised in London. Her first ever visit to India turns into a crazy adventure when she gets kidnapped. Only to learn that for reasons yet unknown, she is supposed to be the youngest Prime Minister of the largest democracy of the world. With massive responsibility on her shoulders, and dainty stilettoes on her feet, she is expected to lead her country to greatness. Will she?
